long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClicTabz is a tab Manager that helps you to save and organize your browser tabs.
 
Overrides NewTab of chrome browser and provides a space where you can
    -Save browser sessions that can be reviewed later.
    -Add bookmark links from any page to existing collections by 
     clicking the extension pop up
